20110103140136.000|20110103140138.000|TR0|on many levels.  The U.S. Navy is 
20110103140138.000|20110103140141.000|TR0|investigating a series of raunchy videos 
20110103140141.000|20110103140144.000|TR0|shown aboard the aircraft carrier the USS 
20110103140144.000|20110103140146.000|TR0|Enterprise.  Videos complete with f-bombs

20110103140149.000|20110103140151.000|TR0|ship was supporting U.S. troops fighting 
20110103140151.000|20110103140154.000|TR0|and dying in combat.

20110103142157.000|20110103142200.000|TR0|compare websites, Kyra.  You will not find 
20110103142200.000|20110103142202.000|TR0|American Airlines fares or schedules on 
20110103142202.000|20110103142205.000|TR0|Expedia today, probably not tomorrow, and

20110103142213.000|20110103142215.000|TR0|saying that American's new Direct to 
20110103142215.000|20110103142218.000|TR0|Connect, their own way of trying to sell 
20110103142218.000|20110103142220.000|TR0|tickets, is fundamentally bad for 
20110103142220.000|20110103142223.000|TR0|travelers, it's anti-consumer, and 
20110103142223.000|20110103142225.000|TR0|anti-choice. Those are some pretty strong 
20110103142225.000|20110103142228.000|TR0|words.

20110103142238.000|20110103142241.000|TR0|more of its customer traffic, and it wants 
20110103142241.000|20110103142243.000|TR0|to be able to sell things like, not just 
20110103142243.000|20110103142246.000|TR0|point A to point B airfare, Kyra, but 
20110103142246.000|20110103142248.000|TR0|also, say, preboarding rights, which comes 
20110103142248.000|20110103142251.000|TR0|with a little fee, other things that they 
20110103142251.000|20110103142253.000|TR0|want to package together.
20110103142253.000|20110103142256.000|TR0|
20110103142256.000|20110103142259.000|TR0|So, this fundamental way that American 
20110103142259.000|20110103142301.000|TR0|Airline tickets are being sold is 
20110103142301.000|20110103142304.000|TR0|something that's a fight right now between 
20110103142304.000|20110103142306.000|TR0|Expedia and American. And so, if you are

20110103144401.000|20110103144403.000|TR0|means that they -- they basically are in a 
20110103144403.000|20110103144406.000|TR0|position where they are more powerful, 
20110103144406.000|20110103144408.000|TR0|they can command more prices, and the

20110103145731.000|20110103145733.000|TR0|little tiny cog in.  So I don't envy those 
20110103145733.000|20110103145736.000|TR0|performers.

20110103145832.000|20110103145835.000|TR0|VENESKY:  I never perform anything that I 
20110103145835.000|20110103145837.000|TR0|haven't done in practice at least 100 
20110103145837.000|20110103145840.000|TR0|times.  I'm always sure that my rigging is

20110103145847.000|20110103145850.000|TR0|there are no shortcuts.  A close friend 
20110103145850.000|20110103145853.000|TR0|fell to his death two years ago working 
20110103145853.000|20110103145855.000|TR0|for another company. Since then, for her, 
20110103145855.000|20110103145858.000|TR0|safety is paramount.
